# Load libraries and data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
source("99_proj_func.R")
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
df <- read_tsv("../data/03_dat_aug.tsv")
```

```{r}
all_genes <- colnames(df) %>% .[- c(1,2,3)] %>% list()
df_genes <- df %>% dplyr::select(all_of(all_genes))
```
